attributes.action: Ensure that David Cameron doesn't resign, and REMAIN in the European Union
attributes.background: We the undersigned call upon HM Government to ensure that David Cameron does not resign and Great Britain remains a member of the EU. Working together with the EU to resolve the concerns of the people but to also maintain the trade agreements in place which have been implemented over the years.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.
